entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 this morning then rising.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 11 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
